SongName: A Sky Full Of Stars (Hardwell Remix)
Lyric:
[01:16.470]'Cause you're a sky, cause you're a sky full of stars
[01:23.980]I'm gonna give you my heart
[01:31.450]'Cause you're a sky, cause you're a sky full of stars
[01:38.760]'Cause you light up the path
[01:45.490]
[01:46.850]I don't care, go on and tear me apart
[01:53.750]I don't care if you do
[02:01.480]'Cause in a sky, cause in a sky full of stars
[02:06.170]I think I saw you
[02:12.230]
[02:37.310]'Cause you're a sky, cause you're a sky full of stars
[02:42.640]I think I saw you
[02:51.710]I want to die in your arms, arms
[03:22.070]'Cause you're a sky, cause you're a sky full of stars
[03:26.220]
[03:27.240]Such a heavenly view
[03:34.410]You're such a heavenly view
[03:50.450]
